question: Who is Zyptics?
answer: Zyptics is a team of AI experts, engineers, and business strategists focused on building intelligent automation solutions.

question: What is Zyptics' mission?
answer: Our mission is to democratize AI automation by delivering measurable ROI within 90 days, while maintaining a strong focus on security and compliance.

question: How do you build your solutions?
answer: Every automation we build is fully custom-coded using powerful libraries, APIs, and frameworks. We don't use click-and-drop builders, ensuring each solution is tailored specifically to your business.

question: How do I get started with Zyptics?
answer: Once you purchase a subscription, you'll receive a secure account activation link via email to get started. Our team then begins setting up your personalized dashboard.

question: How long does initial setup take?
answer: Initial setup is typically within 24-72 hours. After purchasing a plan, your custom dashboard will be ready in 2 to 7 business days, depending on complexity.

question: Why does my dashboard look empty at first?
answer: Don't worry if your dashboard is empty initially. We need a little time to personalize it specifically for your business. Once set up, you'll see all your custom workflows and tools.

question: What services does Zyptics offer?
answer: Our core AI automation offerings include AI Chatbots & Virtual Assistants, Automated Ticket Routing, and Voice Response Systems.

question: What are the benefits of your AI automation?
answer: Our services can save over 40 hours per week, potentially increase revenue by 30%, come with a 99.9% uptime guarantee, and improve customer satisfaction.

question: What subscription plans do you offer?
answer: We offer Starter (€199/mo), Growth (€499/mo), Business (€999/mo), and custom Enterprise plans (from €1,999/mo).

question: Can I change my subscription plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime with no hassle. Changes take effect immediately with prorated billing.

question: What happens if I go over my workflow limit?
answer: We monitor your workflow usage and will notify you if you approach your limit. You can then upgrade your plan or discuss custom pricing for more workflows.

question: Are there setup fees?
answer: No, all plans come with free onboarding and setup assistance.

question: Why should I choose a subscription?
answer: Subscriptions offer continuous value through updates, dedicated support, and scalability. They also have a lower upfront cost and yearly plans offer significant discounts.

question: Do you offer services without a subscription?
answer: Yes, we offer one-time integrations for specific solutions like Automated Ticket Routing (€600), AI Chatbots (€1,200), and Voice Response Systems (€1,600), among others.

question: How can I contact support?
answer: You can reach our human support team by emailing info@zyptics.com or using the live chat on our website.

question: What are your support hours?
answer: We are available Monday–Friday, from 9am to 6pm CET.

question: I can't log in, what should I do?
answer: First, make sure you're using the email you signed up with. If you need to reset your password, just enter your email on the login page to receive a reset link. If you're still stuck, we can connect you to a human agent.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept major credit/debit cards, cryptocurrencies, and ACH payments, all securely processed through Stripe.

question: How do you handle data and privacy?
answer: Your data security is our priority. We follow strict security protocols, never sell or share your data, and all automations are built with GDPR compliance and enterprise-grade encryption.
